helpSupport.appDescription: The ultimate crypto mining simulation app. Mine, earn, and learn about cryptocurrency in a safe and educational environment
helpSupport.faq1Answer: Crypto mining is the process of validating transactions and adding them to the blockchain. Our app simulates this process and rewards users with cryptocurrency tokens for their participation.
helpSupport.faq2Question: How do I withdraw my earnings?
helpSupport.faq2Answer: You can withdraw your earnings once you reach the minimum withdrawal threshold. Go to the Wallet screen and tap the "Withdraw" button to transfer funds to your external wallet.
helpSupport.faq3Question: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
helpSupport.faq3Answer: The minimum withdrawal amount is 0.001 BTC or equivalent in other supported cryptocurrencies. This helps cover network transaction fees.
helpSupport.faq4Answer: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your account. We recommend enabling two-factor authentication for additional security.
helpSupport.faq5Answer: Currently, our app supports Bitcoin mining simulation. We plan to add support for other cryptocurrencies in future updates.
helpSupport.faq6Answer: Rewards are calculated and distributed every 24 hours. You can check your mining progress in the Home screen.

about.appTagline: The ultimate crypto mining simulation app
about.aboutDescription: CryptoMiner is an educational cryptocurrency mining simulation app designed to help users learn about blockchain technology and cryptocurrency mining in a safe, controlled environment. Our mission is to make cryptocurrency education accessible to everyone.
about.teamDescription: CryptoMiner is developed by a passionate team of blockchain enthusiasts, developers, and educators committed to making cryptocurrency accessible to everyone.
about.missionText: We believe that everyone should have access to quality cryptocurrency education. Our app provides a safe, educational environment where users can learn about blockchain technology and cryptocurrency mining without financial risk.

terms.importantNotice: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: This app is for educational and simulation purposes only. No real cryptocurrency mining occurs, and no real financial value is generated.
terms.acceptanceOfTermsText: By accessing and using the RAW MINER mobile application ("App"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
terms.descriptionOfServiceText: RAW MINER is a mobile application that simulates cryptocurrency mining activities for educational and entertainment purposes. The App provides users with a virtual mining experience, including simulated mining operations, virtual coin generation, and educational content about blockchain technology.
terms.descriptionImportant: Important: This App does NOT perform actual cryptocurrency mining. All mining activities are simulations, and no real cryptocurrency is generated, stored, or transferred.
terms.virtualCurrencyText: The App features virtual coins and mining rewards that have no real-world monetary value. These virtual assets are:
terms.virtualCurrencyBullet1: • Purely for entertainment and educational purposes
terms.virtualCurrencyBullet2: • Not exchangeable for real money or cryptocurrency
terms.virtualCurrencyBullet3: • Not backed by any real assets or financial instruments
terms.virtualCurrencyBullet4: • Subject to change or removal at any time
terms.futureListingText: RAW MINER may introduce a real cryptocurrency token in the future. However, this App currently operates as a simulation and educational platform. Any future cryptocurrency offerings will be subject to:
terms.userAccountsText: To access certain features of the App, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
terms.userAccountsBullet1: • Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
terms.userAccountsBullet2: • All activities that occur under your account
terms.userAccountsBullet3: • Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use
terms.userAccountsBullet4: • Providing accurate and complete information during registration
terms.acceptableUseText: You agree not to use the App to:
terms.acceptableUseBullet1: • Violate any applicable laws or regulations
terms.acceptableUseBullet2: • Infringe upon the rights of others
terms.acceptableUseBullet3: • Transmit harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content
terms.acceptableUseBullet4: • Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the App or other users' accounts
terms.acceptableUseBullet5: • Interfere with the proper functioning of the App
terms.acceptableUseBullet6: • Use automated systems or bots to access the App
terms.acceptableUseBullet7: • Attempt to manipulate or exploit the virtual mining system
terms.educationalDisclaimerText: This App is designed solely for educational and entertainment purposes. Users acknowledge that:
terms.educationalDisclaimerBullet1: • No real cryptocurrency mining occurs within the App
terms.educationalDisclaimerBullet2: • Virtual coins and rewards have no real-world value
terms.educationalDisclaimerBullet3: • The App does not provide financial advice or investment opportunities
terms.educationalDisclaimerBullet4: • Mining simulations are not indicative of real mining profitability
terms.educationalDisclaimerBullet5: • The App should not be used as a learning tool for real cryptocurrency mining
terms.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy governs the collection, use, and protection of your personal information. By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of information as outlined in our Privacy Policy.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: The App and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by RAW and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws. The App name "RAW MINER" and associated branding are trademarks of RAW.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityTitle: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW:
terms.limitationOfLiabilityText1: RAW shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of the App.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityText2: The App is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
terms.indemnificationText: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless RAW, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, or debt arising from your use of the App or violation of these Terms.
terms.accountTerminationText: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the App immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including but not limited to:
terms.accountTerminationBullet1: • Violation of these Terms of Service
terms.accountTerminationBullet3: • Attempts to manipulate the App's systems
terms.changesToTermsText: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be communicated to users through the App or via email. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
terms.governingLawText: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which RAW operates. Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the App shall be resolved in the appropriate courts of that jurisdiction.
terms.contactInformationText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
terms.acknowledgmentText: By using the RAW MINER App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. You also acknowledge that this App is for educational and entertainment purposes only and does not provide real cryptocurrency mining services.
terms.legalNoticeText: This application is a simulation and educational tool. No real cryptocurrency mining, trading, or financial transactions occur. Virtual assets have no real-world value. This App is not intended as financial advice or investment guidance.

terms.title: Terms of Service

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the RAW MINER mobile application ("App"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

section2.title: 2. Description of Service
section2.content: RAW MINER is a mobile application that simulates cryptocurrency mining activities for educational and entertainment purposes. The App provides users with a virtual mining experience, including simulated mining operations, virtual coin generation, and educational content about blockchain technology.
section2.disclaimer: This App does NOT perform actual cryptocurrency mining. All mining activities are simulations, and no real cryptocurrency is generated, stored, or transferred.

section3.title: 3. Virtual Currency and Assets
section3.content: The App features virtual coins and mining rewards that have no real-world monetary value. These virtual assets are:
section3.bullet1: Purely for entertainment and educational purposes
section3.bullet2: Not exchangeable for real money or cryptocurrency
section3.bullet3: Not backed by any real assets or financial instruments
section3.bullet4: Subject to change or removal at any time

section4.title: 4. Future Cryptocurrency Listing
section4.content: RAW MINER may introduce a real cryptocurrency token in the future. However, this App currently operates as a simulation and educational platform. Any future cryptocurrency offerings will be subject to:

section5.title: 5. User Accounts and Registration
section5.content: To access certain features of the App, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
section5.bullet1: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
section5.bullet2: All activities that occur under your account
section5.bullet3: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use
section5.bullet4: Providing accurate and complete information during registration

section6.title: 6. Acceptable Use Policy
section6.content: You agree not to use the App to:
section6.bullet1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
section6.bullet2: Infringe upon the rights of others
section6.bullet3: Transmit harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content
section6.bullet4: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the App or other users' accounts
section6.bullet5: Interfere with the proper functioning of the App
section6.bullet6: Use automated systems or bots to access the App
section6.bullet7: Attempt to manipulate or exploit the virtual mining system

section7.title: 7. Educational and Simulation Disclaimer
section7.content: This App is designed solely for educational and entertainment purposes. Users acknowledge that:
section7.bullet1: No real cryptocurrency mining occurs within the App
section7.bullet2: Virtual coins and rewards have no real-world value
section7.bullet3: The App does not provide financial advice or investment opportunities
section7.bullet4: Mining simulations are not indicative of real mining profitability
section7.bullet5: The App should not be used as a learning tool for real cryptocurrency mining

section8.title: 8. Privacy and Data Protection
section8.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy governs the collection, use, and protection of your personal information. By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of information as outlined in our Privacy Policy.

section9.title: 9. Intellectual Property Rights
section9.content: The App and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by RAW and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws. The App name "RAW MINER" and associated branding are trademarks of RAW.

section10.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
section10.maximum: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW:
section10.content: RAW shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of the App.
section10.disclaimer: The App is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied.

section11.title: 11. Indemnification
section11.content: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless RAW, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, or debt arising from your use of the App or violation of these Terms.

section12.title: 12. Account Termination
section12.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the App immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including but not limited to:
section12.bullet1: Violation of these Terms of Service
section12.bullet3: Attempts to manipulate the App's systems

section13.title: 13. Changes to Terms
section13.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be communicated to users through the App or via email. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

section14.title: 14. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
section14.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which RAW operates. Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the App shall be resolved in the appropriate courts of that jurisdiction.

section15.title: 15. Contact Information
section15.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

section16.title: 16. Acknowledgment and Consent
section16.content: By using the RAW MINER App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. You also acknowledge that this App is for educational and entertainment purposes only and does not provide real cryptocurrency mining services.

legalNotice.title: LEGAL NOTICE
legalNotice.content: This application is a simulation and educational tool. No real cryptocurrency mining, trading, or financial transactions occur. Virtual assets have no real-world value. This App is not intended as financial advice or investment guidance.

privacy.introductionText: CryptoMiner ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.
privacy.personalInformationText:
We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
• Create an account
• Complete your profile
• Contact our support team
• Participate in surveys or promotions
privacy.deviceInformationText:
We automatically collect certain information about your device, including:
• Device type and model
• Operating system version
• App version
• IP address
• Device identifiers
privacy.usageInformationText:
We collect information about how you use our app, including:
• Features you access
• Time spent in the app
• Mining activities
• App performance data
privacy.howWeUseYourInformationText:
We use the information we collect to:
• Provide and maintain our services
• Process your transactions
• Send you notifications and updates
• Improve our app and user experience
• Provide customer support
• Ensure security and prevent fraud
• Comply with legal obligations
privacy.informationSharingText:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:
• With your explicit consent
• To comply with legal obligations
• To protect our rights and safety
• With service providers who assist us in operating our app
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete or anonymize it.
privacy.yourRightsText:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal information
• Correct inaccurate information
• Request deletion of your information
• Object to our processing of your data
• Request data portability
• Withdraw consent at any time
privacy.cookiesAndTrackingText: Our app may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can control cookie settings through your device settings, but disabling cookies may affect app functionality.
privacy.thirdPartyServicesText: Our app may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.
privacy.childrensPrivacyText: Our app is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacy.internationalTransfersText: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws.
privacy.changesToThisPolicyText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy in the app and updating the "Last Updated" date.
privacy.contactUsText:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
Email: privacy@cryptominer.com
Address: [Company Address]
Phone: [Company Phone]
privacy.californiaPrivacyRightsText: California residents have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). If you are a California resident, you may request information about our data collection and sharing practices.
privacy.gdprComplianceText: If you are located in the European Union, you have additional rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are committed to complying with GDPR requirements.
privacy.legalNoticeText: By using our app, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and agree to our collection and use of your information as described herein.
